data.title: Bridal Veil Falls State Park, Corbett
data.meta_description: Bridal Veil Falls State Scenic Viewpoint, located along the Historic Columbia River Highway, offers visitors a mesmerizing display of natural beauty amidst the lush forests of the Columbia River Gorge. Large grassy areas and picnic tables are perfect for enjoying lunch before or after hiking around the area. Visitors can marvel at the sight of Bridal Veil Falls plunging into a tranquil pool below, creating a breathtaking spectacle of mist and spray against the verdant backdrop of the forest. In addition to its stunning waterfall, Bridal Veil Falls State Scenic Viewpoint offers opportunities for picnicking and hiking amidst the natural beauty of the gorge.
